description:
Is your scale stuck? Do you have some extra weight and inches around your middle that you would like to disappear? If so, this course is for you! As a Health Coach, Nutritionist, and someone who has kept off 45lbs for over 10 years and worked with thousands of clients, I know that simple solutions are the best for long-term weight loss.

In this course, you will learn about the metabolism and how to boost it. You will receive recipes and breakfast ideas in PDF and audio format. You will also learn about goal setting and walk away with an action plan you can take right away!

By the end of this course, you will feel confident to know that you can lose weight, have more energy, be prepared with go-to meal and smoothie ideas, and have an action plan that fits into your unique lifestyle.
title: How to Lose Weight Fast with Breakfast
